title: Winklevoss Twins Set Aside Up to 30% of Gemini Stock for Retail Traders
description: Retail traders are getting a rare chance to make big bets on the billionaire-backed Gemini Space Station Inc. before the cryptocurrency exchange makes its trading debut Friday.

title: Oracle Shares Surge Most Since 1992 on Cloud Contract Wins
description: Oracle Corp. shares gained the most since 1992 after the company gave an aggressive outlook for its cloud business, cementing the software maker’s place in the race to support demand for artificial intelligence computing.

title: Ellison Tops Musk as World’s Richest Man After $101 Billion Gain
description: Larry Ellison briefly surpassed Elon Musk to become the world’s richest person Wednesday after a jump in Oracle Corp. shares added a record amount to his fortune.
